scripts.dev:size-contracts: npm run compile-all && npx hardhat size-contracts
scripts.deploy:test-tokens: npm run compile-all && npx hardhat run scripts/deployment/deploy-test-tokens.js --network goerli
scripts.deploy:bridge: npm run compile-all && npx hardhat run scripts/deployment/deploy-bridge.js --network
scripts.deploy:verify:bridge: npm run compile-all && npx hardhat run scripts/EthErc20FastBridge/deploy_and_verify_bridge.js --network
scripts.upgrade:bridge: npm run compile-all && npx hardhat run scripts/EthErc20FastBridge/upgrade_bridge.js --network
scripts.dev:abi: npx hardhat clear-abi && npx hardhat export-abi
scripts.docgen: npx shx rm -rf docs && npx solidity-docgen --solc-module solc -t docgen -H docgen/helpers.js -o docs/
scripts.dev:lint: npm run dev:eslint && npm run dev:solhint
scripts.flatten: npx hardhat flatten contracts/EthErc20FastBridge.sol > res/EthErc20FastBridge_flat.sol && npx hardhat flatten contracts/TestToken.sol > res/TestToken_flat.sol
scripts.storage-layout: npx hardhat check 2>&1 | sed -r "s/\x1B\[([0-9]{1,3}(;[0-9]{1,2};?)?)?[mGK]//g" | tee  res/storage_layout.txt
scripts.postinstall: npm run compile && npm run dev:abi
scripts.clean: npx shx rm -rf artifacts cache coverage coverage.json .openzeppelin && npx shx echo Cleaned
